attributes.name: event_probability
attributes.desc: Probability or Confidence Level that event occured (bet. 0 and 1)

attributes.name: event_importance
attributes.desc: Rating or importance of the event (between 0 and 1). Can be used by automated methods to denote a metric.

attributes.name: kb_archivdate
attributes.desc: Date when VOEvent entry was imported into Knowledge Base

attributes.name: kb_archivid
attributes.desc: Unique internal ID of VOEvent entry

attributes.name: kb_archivist
attributes.desc: Name of Archivist (internal. user should leave blank)

attributes.name: kb_archivurl
attributes.desc: URL of VOEvent entry (internal. user should leave blank)

attributes.name: event_coordsys
attributes.desc: Coordinate system type (Choose between UTC-HGS-TOPO [Heliographics Stonyhurst UTC-HPR-TOPO [Helioprojective]; UTC-HGC-TOPO[Heliographic Carrington]; UTC-HCR-TOPO[Helio-centric radial])

attributes.name: event_expires
attributes.desc: Useful for reporting events before they are complete (e.g. 2004-02-14T02:00:01)

attributes.name: event_maskurl
attributes.desc: URL to files which contain masks (e.g. binary masks) of region of interest.

attributes.name: event_clippedspatial
attributes.desc: Whether the spatial extent of the event is wholly contained within the data set ('T' or 'F').

attributes.name: event_clippedtemporal
attributes.desc: Whether the temporal duration of the event is wholly contained within the data set ('T' or 'F').

attributes.name: event_testflag
attributes.desc: A boolean flag to indicate that the event is for testing purposes ('T' or 'F')

attributes.name: frm_contact
attributes.desc: Contact information of Feature Recognition Method (FRM)

attributes.name: frm_daterun
attributes.desc: Date when Feature Recognition Method (FRM) was run (e.g. 2004-02-15T02:00:01)

attributes.name: frm_humanflag
attributes.desc: Whether a Human identified the event ("T" or "F")

attributes.name: frm_institute
attributes.desc: Institute where the Feature Recognition Method (FRM) orginates

attributes.name: frm_name
attributes.desc: Name of Feature Recognition Method (e.g. "Mark Cheung" or CACTUS")

attributes.name: frm_versionnumber
attributes.desc: Version number of automated Feature Recognition Method (Put age if Human. Just kidding. In this case put 1.0)

attributes.name: frm_url
attributes.desc: URL to webpage containing information about the Feature Recognition Method

attributes.name: frm_specificid
attributes.desc: The specific ID of this event/feature assigned by the Feature Recognitio Method

attributes.name: obs_channelid
attributes.desc: Name of Channel of the instrument (e.g. "G band")

attributes.name: bound_ccnsteps
attributes.desc: Number of steps in bounding chain code (useful for coronal hole boundaries)

attributes.name: rasterscan
attributes.desc: Field for ascii string of raster scan

attributes.name: rasterscantype
attributes.desc: type of raster scan (E.g. "EGSO_SFC" if you are using the EGSO Solar Feature Catalogue convection for the raster scan)

attributes.name: ar_numspots
attributes.desc: Number of spots in Active region

attributes.name: ar_polarity
attributes.desc: Polarity of Active region ('1' or '-1' for positive and negative respectively)

attributes.name: ar_spotarearaw
attributes.desc: Area of spots in active region in plane of sky

attributes.name: ar_spotarearepr
attributes.desc: Reprojected area of spots in heliographic units

attributes.name: ar_spotarearepruncert
attributes.desc: Uncertainty Reprojected area of spots in heliographic units

attributes.name: sharp_noaa_ars
attributes.desc: Comma separated list of NOAA_ARS within lat/lon bounding box. Can include ones without NOAA# at time of event.

attributes.name: cme_radiallinvel
attributes.desc: Radial Linear fit radial velocity of CME

attributes.name: cme_radiallinvelmin
attributes.desc: Mininum linear radial velocity of CME

attributes.name: cme_radiallinvelmax
attributes.desc: Maximum linear radial velocity of CME

attributes.name: cme_radiallinvelstddev
attributes.desc: Standard Deviation of radial velocity of CME

attributes.name: cme_radiallinvelunit
attributes.desc: Units for Radial velocity of CME (e.g. 'km/s')

attributes.name: cme_angularwidthunit
attributes.desc: Units for angular width of CME (e.g. 'deg')

attributes.name: cme_massuncert
attributes.desc: Uncertainty in mass contained in cme

attributes.name: area_atdiskcenter
attributes.desc: Area of event at disk center

attributes.name: area_atdiskcenteruncert
attributes.desc: Uncertainty of area at disk center

attributes.name: area_raw
attributes.desc: Area of event in sky plane

attributes.name: area_uncert
attributes.desc: Uncertainty of area in sky plane

attributes.name: area_unit
attributes.desc: Units of area in sky plane (e.g. 'arcsec2')

attributes.name: event_npixels
attributes.desc: Number of pixels pertaining to event

attributes.name: event_pixelunit
attributes.desc: Units of values given in pixels

attributes.name: freqmaxrange
attributes.desc: Maximum of the frequency range of oscillation

attributes.name: freqminrange
attributes.desc: Minimum of the frequency range of oscillation

attributes.name: freqpeakpower
attributes.desc: Frequency at which power spectrum peaks

attributes.name: intensmaxampl
attributes.desc: Maximum amplitude of oscillation in intensity signal

attributes.name: intensminampl
attributes.desc: Minimum amplitude of oscillation in intensity signal

attributes.name: oscillnperiods
attributes.desc: Number of periods detected in oscillation

attributes.name: oscillnperiodsuncert
attributes.desc: Uncertainty of number of periods detected in oscillation

attributes.name: peakpowerunit
attributes.desc: Units of peak power of oscillation

attributes.name: velocmaxampl
attributes.desc: Maximum amplitude of oscillation in velocity signal (e.g. doppler signal)

attributes.name: velocmaxpower
attributes.desc: Maximum power of oscillation in velocity signal

attributes.name: velocmaxpoweruncert
attributes.desc: Uncertainty in max power in velocity signal

attributes.name: velocminampl
attributes.desc: Minimum amplitude in oscillating velocity signal

attributes.name: wavedisplmaxampl
attributes.desc: Maximum amplitude of oscillation in displacement signal

attributes.name: wavedisplminampl
attributes.desc: Minimum amplitude of oscillatoin in displacement signal

attributes.name: wavelmaxpower
attributes.desc: Wavelength at which spatial power spectrum peaks

attributes.name: wavelmaxrange
attributes.desc: Maximum wavelength of wavelength range for spatial oscillation

attributes.name: wavelminrange
attributes.desc: Minimum wavelength of wavelength range for spatial oscillation

attributes.name: ef_pospeakfluxonsetrate
attributes.desc: Emergence rate of positive polarity flux

attributes.name: ef_negpeakfluxonsetrate
attributes.desc: Emergence rate of negative polarity flux

attributes.name: ef_sumpossignedflux
attributes.desc: Total positive signed flux at completion

attributes.name: ef_sumnegsignedflux
attributes.desc: Total negative signed flux at completion (negative number)

attributes.name: ef_axisorientation
attributes.desc: Axis orientation of emerging flux pair (CCW from parallels in Stonyhurst longitude

attributes.name: ef_axislength
attributes.desc: Axis length of emerging flux pair at completion

attributes.name: ef_posequivradius
attributes.desc: Equivalent radius (i.e. sqrt(area/pi) of positive polarity at completion

attributes.name: ef_negequivradius
attributes.desc: Equivalent radius (i.e. sqrt(area/pi) of negative polarity at completion

attributes.name: maxmagfieldstrengthunit
attributes.desc: Units for maximum magnetic field strength (e.g. 'G' or 'Mx/cm2')

attributes.name: outflow_length
attributes.desc: Length of outflow (can be for CoronalJet or SpraySurge)

attributes.name: outflow_transspeed
attributes.desc: Transverse speed relative to outflow direction

attributes.name: obs_dataprepurl
attributes.desc: URL pointing to information about how data was reduced

attributes.name: fl_halphaclass
attributes.desc: H Alpha classification (used on some Yohkoh HXT)

attributes.name: cd_mass
attributes.desc: Mass estimate calculated for dimming event

attributes.name: fi_tilt
attributes.desc: Mean tilt angle (in degrees) of the Filament spine (given as Skel_ChainCode) w.r. to solar equator

attributes.name: fi_barbsr
attributes.desc: Total number of Right Bearing Barbs

attributes.name: fi_barbsl
attributes.desc: Total number of Left Bearing Barbs

attributes.name: fi_chirality
attributes.desc: Chirality for filament (-1 for sinistral; +1 for dextral; 0 for ambiguous/uncertain)

attributes.name: fi_barbsstartc1
attributes.desc: List of Coord 1 of beginnings (closest to spine) of barbs (list delimited by commas for each numbered barb. e.g. 'x1, x2, x3')

attributes.name: fi_barbsstartc2
attributes.desc: List of Coord 2 of beginnings (closest to spine) of barbs (list delimited by commas for each numbered barb. e.g. 'y1, y2, y3')

attributes.name: fi_barbsendc1
attributes.desc: List of Coord 1 of ends of barbs (list delimited by commas for each numbered barb. e.g. 'x1, x2, x3')

attributes.name: fi_barbsendc2
attributes.desc: List of Coord 2 of ends of barbs (list delimited by commas for each numbered barb. e.g. 'y1, y2, y3')

attributes.name: sg_chirality
attributes.desc: Chirality of sigmoid (-1 for sinistral; +1 for dextral; 0 for ambiguous/uncertain)

attributes.name: sg_orientation
attributes.desc: Angular rotation (ccw in degrees) of the main axis of the sigmoid to the active region

attributes.name: obs_firstprocessingdate
attributes.desc: Earliest date of all images considered part of the event

attributes.name: obs_lastprocessingdate
attributes.desc: Latest date of all images considered part of the event

attributes.name: obs_includesnrt
attributes.desc: "T" if any image in the event has the NRT flag (bit 30 in QUALITY), "F" otherwise

attributes.name: ss_spinrateunit
attributes.desc: Unit Spin/Rotation rate of sunspots (e.g. Deg/day)

attributes.name: cc_majoraxis
attributes.desc: Length of major axis of elliptical fit to cavity

attributes.name: cc_minoraxis
attributes.desc: Length of minor axis of elliptical fit to cavity

attributes.name: cc_axisunit
attributes.desc: Unit of measure for major and minor axes. Typically Rsun

attributes.name: cc_tiltanglemajorfromradial
attributes.desc: Angle between major axis and local disk-projected radial vector, measured clockwise from radial vector.

attributes.name: cc_tiltangleunit
attributes.desc: Unit of measure for CC_TiltAngleMaorFromRadial. Typicall deg.

attributes.name: to_shape
attributes.desc: Apparent shape of topological object. Example values can be X-point, cusp, dome, line.

attributes.name: meangradienttotal
attributes.desc: Mean value of the total field gradient

attributes.name: meangradientvert
attributes.desc: Mean value of the vertical field gradient

attributes.name: meangradienthorz
attributes.desc: Mean value of the horizontal field gradient

attributes.name: absnetcurrenthelicity
attributes.desc: Absolute value of the net current helicity

attributes.name: savncpp
attributes.desc: Sum of the Absolute Value of the Net Currents Per Polarity (SAVNCPP)

attributes.name: meanphotoenergydensity
attributes.desc: Mean photospheric excess magnetic energy density

attributes.name: totalphotoenergydensity
attributes.desc: Total photospheric magnetic energy density (TOTPOT in SHARP)

attributes.name: totalphotoenergy
attributes.desc: Total photospheric magnetic energy (TOTPOT in SHARP times pixel width)

attributes.name: highshearareapercent
attributes.desc: Area with shear angle greater than 45 as a percent of total area

attributes.name: highsheararea
attributes.desc: Area with shear angle greater than 45 as a percent of total area

attributes.name: log_r_value
attributes.desc: Log (Unsigned Flux R) (prelog value in Gauss*MDI-pixels - Schrijver 2007)

attributes.name: ar_neutrallength
attributes.desc: The total length of polarity separation line segments within the AR

attributes.name: ar_pilcurvature
attributes.desc: Dimensionless curvature of main PIL (PIL length / direct distance between endpoints)

attributes.name: search_frm_name
attributes.desc: Condensed FRM Name list for searching
